00040     public static class Utilities
00041     {
00042         #region String Validation Methods
00043         public static bool IsValidEmail(this string email)
00044         {
00045             Regex regex = new Regex("[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\\.[A-Z]{2,4}", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);
00046             return regex.IsMatch(email);
00047         }
00048 
00049         public static bool isValidPassword(this string password, int min, int max)
00050         {
00051             Regex regex = new Regex("^[A-Z0-9]{" + min + "," + max + "}$", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);
00052             return regex.IsMatch(password);
00053         }
00054 
00055         public static bool IsValidPhone(this string phone)
00056         {
00057             Regex regex = new Regex("[^0-9]");
00058             string newPhone = regex.Replace(phone, "");
00059 
00060             return 10 <= newPhone.Length && newPhone.Length <= 11;
00061         }
00062 
00063         public static bool IsValidState(this string input)
00064         {
00065             return input.IsValidLength(2, 2) && input.AllLetters();
00066         }
00067 
00068         public static bool IsValidLength(this string input, int min, int max)
00069         {
00070             return min <= input.Length && input.Length <= max;
00071         }
00072 
00073         public static bool IsValidZip(this string input)
00074         {
00075             return input.IsValidLength(5, 5) && input.AllDigits();
00076         }
00077 
00078         public static bool IsValidCreditCard(this string input)
00079         {
00080             return input.IsValidLength(15, 16) && input.AllDigits();
00081         }
00082 
00083         public static bool IsValidSecurityCode(this string input)
00084         {
00085             return input.IsValidLength(3, 4) && input.AllDigits();
00086         }
00087 
00088         public static bool IsValidName(this string input)
00089         {
00090             Regex regex = new Regex("[a-z ]", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);
00091             return regex.IsMatch(input);
00092         }
00093 
00094         public static bool AllLetters(this string input)
00095         {
00096             return input.ToCharArray().All(x => char.IsLetter(x));
00097         }
00098 
00099         public static bool AllDigits(this string input)
00100         {
00101             return input.ToCharArray().All(x => char.IsDigit(x));
00102         }
00103         #endregion
00104     }
